scripts.build:mini: DISABLE_ESLINT_PLUGIN=true PUBLIC_URL=./ react-scripts build && cd build && zip -r build.zip * && cd -
scripts.build:notes: echo $(git rev-parse --short=7 HEAD | tr -d [:punct:]).$(git config --global user.name | sed 's/ //g')
scripts.minis:build: yarn --silent build:mini && echo $(yarn --silent minis:id ) && snapdev minis build create -p $(yarn --silent minis:id)  -f build/build.zip  -n $(yarn --silent build:notes) -v $(yarn --silent build:version)  -d
scripts.minis:release: snapdev minis release create -p $(yarn --silent minis:id) -m 4c3cd7e6-df0e-461a-a296-eef7b4fa0d84 -n $(yarn --silent build:version)
scripts.minis:build-rapid: snapdev minis build create -p $(yarn --silent minis:id) -d -u $(yarn --silent rapid:host )/ -n $(yarn --silent rapid:host)/ -v $(yarn --silent rapid:version)
scripts.minis:release-rapid: snapdev minis release create -p $(yarn --silent minis:id) -m 4c3cd7e6-df0e-461a-a296-eef7b4fa0d84 -n $(yarn --silent rapid:version)
